mapper.insert: insert into ORD_L_DEALLOG (operate_logid, order_id, partition_id, operate_time, operator_id, operator_name, deal_content, result_code, result_info, original_state,current_state) values(${operate_logid}, ${order_id}, ${partition_id}, sysdate, '00000', '后台更新', #{deal_content}, #{result_code}, #{result_info}, #{original_state}, #{current_state})

insert into ord_d_pay (order_id, partition_id, pay_order, pay_type, pay_mode, pay_state, order_fee, pay_fee, pay_time)
select ${item.order_id}, ${item.partition_id}, ${item.pay_order}, #{item.pay_type}, #{item.pay_mode}, #{item.pay_state}, ${item.order_fee}, ${item.pay_fee}, to_date(#{item.pay_time},'yyyymmddhh24miss') from dual
mapper.update: update ord_d_pay set pay_state = #{pay_state}, pay_mode = #{pay_mode}, pay_time = sysdate where order_id = ${order_id} and pay_mode in ('10', '15', '30', '40')
